title: 20.三体、远征
paragraphs: 寒冷黎明中的大地上空荡荡的一无所有。没有金字塔，没有联合国大厦，巨摆纪念碑也不知去向，只有黑乎乎的戈壁滩延伸到天际，与他第一次进入这个世界时一样。但汪淼很快发现这只是自己的错觉，那戈壁滩上密密麻麻的小石块，竟都是人头！原来大地上站满了人。汪淼站在一个稍高些的小丘上向下看，这密密的人海一望无际，汪淼大致估计了一下数量，仅目力所及的范围就可能有几亿人！他知道，三体世界的所有人可能都聚集在这里了。寂静笼罩着一切，这几亿人造就的寂静有一种令人窒息的诡异，这黎明中的人海正在等待什么。汪淼看看附近，发现所有的人都在仰望着天空。

汪淼抬头望去，发现星空发生了不可息议的变化：群星竟然排成了一个严整的正方形阵列！但汪淼很快发现，这一片排成正方形的星星可能只是位于行星同步轨道上，银河系的星海成了后面一个暗淡的背景，这个正方形相对于背景有明显的运行。正方形阵列中，靠晨光一侧的星体亮度最高，发出的银光能在地面上投出人影，向后面亮度逐渐减弱。汪淼数了数，阵列的一边上有三十多颗星体，那么阵列中的星体。总数是一千左右。这显然是由人造物构成的阵列成一个整体在群星的背景上缓缓移动，看上去充满了庄严约力量感。
这时，站在旁边的一个男人轻轻推了推他，低声说：“啊，伟大的哥白尼，你怎么来得这样晚？整整过去了三轮文明，你错过了多么伟大的事业啊！”
“那是什么？”汪淼指指太空中的星体阵列问。
“那是伟大的三体星际舰队，马上就要起航远征了。”
“这么说，三体文明已经具备了星际远航的能力？”
“是的，那些宏伟的飞船都能达到十分之一光速。”
“达到十分之一的光速，至少在我的知识范围内是一个伟大的成就，但对于星际航行来说，还是慢了些。”
“千里之行始于足下，”那人说，“关键是要找对目标。”
“四光年外的一颗带有行星的恒星，那是距三体世界最近的恒星。”
汪淼有些惊奇：“距我们最近的恒星也是四光年。”
“哦，这有没什么可奇怪的，在银河系的大片区域，恒星的密度十分均匀，这是星群引力漫长调节的结果。占相当大比例的恒星，之间的间距就是在三到六光年之间。”

这时，巨大的欢呼声从人海中爆发。汪淼抬头一看，太空中正方形星阵中，每颗星体的亮度都在急剧增加，这显然是它们本身在发出光来。这光芒很快淹没了天边的展曦，一千颗星体很快变成了一千颗小太阳，三体世界迎来了辉煌的白昼。大地上的人们向着天空都高举双手，形成了一望无际的手臂的草原。三体舰队开始加速，庄严地移过苍穹，掠过刚刚升起的巨月顶端，在月面的山脉和平原上投下蔚蓝色的光晕。欢呼声平息了，三体世界的人们默默地看着他们的希望在西方的太空渐渐远去，他们此生看不到结局，但四五百年后，他们的子孙将得到来自新世界的消息，那将是三体文明的新生。汪淼与他们一起默默地遥望着，直到一千颗星星的方阵缩成一颗星，直到这颗星消失在西方的夜空中。字幕出现：
三体文明对新世界的远征开始了，舰队正在航程中……
《三体》游戏结束了，当您回到现实时，如果忠于自己曾做出的的承诺，请按随后发给您的电子邮件中的地址，参加地球三体组织的聚会。

translated_paragraphs: The vast expanse of the land in the cold dawn was empty, with nothing but the endless sandy dunes stretching to the horizon, just as when he first entered this world. But soon汪淼 realized that it was just his illusion. The tiny pebbles on the sandy dunes were actually human heads! It turned out that the ground was filled with people. Standing on a small hillock,汪淼 looked down and saw this sea of people stretching out as far as the eye could see. He estimated the number to be in the billions, and he knew that all the people in the Three-body World were gathered here. Silence reigned over everything. The silence created by these billions of people was eerie and suffocating. The sea of people in the dawn was waiting for something.汪淼 looked around and found that everyone was looking up at the sky.

Wang Xiaomao looked up and saw that the stars in the sky had undergone an unprecedented change: a square array of stars had formed! But Wang Xiaomao soon realized that this square array of stars may only be located in the planet's synchronous orbit, and the Milky Way Galaxy has become a dim background behind it. This square is clearly moving relative to the background. The brighter stars on the side closest to dawn shine with silver light that can cast a shadow on the ground, and the brightness gradually decreases as you move towards the back. Wang Xiaomao counted and found that there were more than 30 stars on one side of the square array, so the total number of stars in the array is around a thousand. This is clearly an array composed of artificial objects that moves as a whole against the background of the stars, appearing full of dignity and power.
At this time, a man standing by gently pushed him and whispered, "Oh, great Copernicus, how did you come so late? Three rounds of civilization have passed, and you have missed such a great cause!"
"What is that?" Wang淼指向太空中的星体阵列问道。
"The Great Three-Body星际舰队 is about to set sail on a long-distance mission."
So, has the Three-body civilization acquired the ability for interstellar travel?
"Yes, those magnificent spacecraft can reach one-tenth the speed of light."
Achieving one-tenth of the speed of light is a great accomplishment within my knowledge, but it is still a bit slow for interstellar travel.
"A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step," the man said, "but the key is to find the right destination."
Where is the destination of the fleet?
"A star with planets four light years away, that is the nearest star to the Three-Body System."
Wang Mei was surprised: "The nearest star to us is also four light years away."
Earth. The tide of the river.

"There's nothing strange about it. In vast regions of the galaxy, the density of stars is very uniform, which is the result of long-term adjustment of star cluster gravity. A considerable proportion of stars have distances between them of three to six light years."

The cheers from the sea of people erupted. Wang Xiaomu looked up and saw that the square star array in the universe was getting brighter and brighter, and it was obviously that they were emitting light on their own. This light quickly overwhelmed the dawn on the horizon, and a thousand stars soon turned into a thousand small suns, bringing brilliant daytime to the Three-body World. People on the earth raised their hands towards the sky, forming an endless sea of arms. The Three-body Fleet began to accelerate and moved solemnly through the sky, passing over the newly risen giant moon, casting a blue halo on the mountains and plains on the moon's surface. The cheers subsided, and the people of the Three-body World looked silently at their hope gradually disappearing in the western space. They would never know the ending of their lives, but several hundred years later, their descendants would receive news from the new world. That would be the rebirth of the Three-body Civilization. Wang Xiaomu watched with them, silently gazing into the distance until the square array of a thousand stars shrank into a single star, and this star disappeared in the western night sky. Subtitles appear:
The three-body civilization's expedition to the new world has begun, and the fleet is on its way...

"The Three-body Game has ended. When you return to reality, if you remain true to the promise you made to yourself, please follow the address in the email we sent you to attend the gathering of the Earth Three-Body Organization."
en_translation_qwen_7b_chat: In the cold dawn, the earth was empty, with no pyramids, no United Nations Building, no Great Spire Memorial, only the endless sandy desert stretching to the horizon, just as he first entered this world. But Wang Mo soon realized that it was just his imagination, because the countless stones on the sandy desert were actually human heads! It turned out that there were many people standing on the earth. Wang Mo stood on a small hill and looked down, and this dense crowd was boundless, Wang Mo estimated that there might be several billion people in sight. He knew that all the people of the Three-body World may have gathered here. Silence reigned over everything. This silence created by several billion people was eerie, making him feel suffocated. Wang Mo looked around and found that everyone was looking up at the sky.

Wang Mo looked up and found that the stars in the sky had undergone an unprecedented change: they had formed a regular square array! But Wang Mo quickly realized that this cluster of stars may simply be located on synchronous orbit around a planet, and the Milky Way galaxy was now a dim background. This square arrangement with respect to the background was clearly moving. On the side facing dawn, the stars in the square were the brightest and emitted silver light that could cast human shadows on the ground, gradually becoming weaker as it moved behind. Wang Mo counted how many stars there were on one side of the square - over thirty. The total number of stars in the array was about one thousand. It was clearly a whole made up of artificial objects moving slowly across the starry background, appearing dignified and powerful.

And at this moment, a man standing by gently pushed him and whispered, "Ah, great Copernicus, how did you come so late? A whole three cycles of civilization have passed, and you've missed such a great cause!"
"What's that?" Wang Mi asked, pointing at the star cluster in space.
"That's the great Three-Body Starfleet, about to embark on a long journey."
"So, the Trisolar System civilization has acquired interstellar travel capability?"
"Yes, those magnificent spacecrafts can reach a speed of one-tenth the speed of light."
"Traveling at one-tenth the speed of light, at least in my knowledge, is a great achievement, but for interstellar travel, it's still slow."
"Starting small is the key to a journey of thousands of miles," he said, "It's all about finding the right direction."
"What is the destination of the fleet?"
"A star 4 light-years away with planets, that's the nearest star to Three-body World."
Wang Mali was surprised: "The nearest star is also four light years away."

"Oh, this is nothing strange. In a large region of the galaxy, the density of stars is very uniform, which is the result of long-term regulation by star clusters' gravity. A considerable proportion of stars have a spacing of 3 to 6 light-years between them."

When this happened, a great cheer erupted from the crowd. Wang Mo looked up and saw that in the square star array in space, each star was getting brighter, clearly emitting light on its own. The light quickly overwhelmed the dawn sky, and a thousand stars became a thousand small suns. The world of Three-Body welcomed a brilliant day. People all over the earth lifted their hands to the sky, forming an endless sea of hands like a prairie. The fleet of three-body ships began to accelerate, slowly passing through the vault of the sky, flying over the newly risen giant moon's summit, casting a blue halo over the mountain ranges and plains on the moon's surface. The cheers subsided, and the people of Three-Body World watched their hope gradually disappear in the western sky. They would never see the end of this story, but in several hundred years, their descendants will receive news from the new world, marking the rebirth of the Three-Body civilization. Wang Mo watched with them, silently, until the square array of a thousand stars shrank into one star, and that star disappeared in the western night sky. The subtitle appeared:
The three-body civilization began their exploration of the new world, with their fleet already en route...

"The Three-Body Game is over. When you return to reality, if you abide by your promise made before, please attend the gathering of the Earth Three-Body Organization according to the address sent to you in the email following."
cn_summaries_qwen_7b_chat: 在这片荒凉的土地上，大地上空无一人，但是却有一群人站在一座小丘上，抬头看向天空。这些人在静静地等待着什么，形成了一片宁静而神秘的景象。
汪淼看到了一个由30多个星球组成的人造物阵列正在银河系背景上缓慢移动。
这段话暗示着哥白尼是一位伟大的科学家，但由于他的迟到而错失了重要的发现。
汪淼指的是太阳系外的一个星体阵列，它们是通过测量和分析宇宙射线等信号而被发现的。这些星体阵列通常包含多个恒星，每个恒星周围都围绕着大量的行星，其中可能存在着生命存在的迹象。
这句话是描述一个即将启航的三体星际舰队的伟大景象，充满了冒险和未知的气氛。

这句话是在描述人类发射太空船的速度无法满足星际航行的要求，因为速度只有十分之一的光速，而光速是目前宇宙中最快的运动速度，因此还需要更先进的技术才能满足星际航行的要求。
这句话的意思是，要想实现一个远大的目标，就必须从小事做起，并且要有明确的目标。

这句文字的意思是：距离三体世界最近的一颗恒星距离地球约4光年。
离我们最近的恒星系是比邻星系统，位于距离地球4.24光年的位置，其中包含一颗名为比邻星的红矮星和三颗行星。因此，最接近我们的恒星也是这四颗行星中的一颗。

这是一个来自中国古典文学《诗经》中的诗句，“沧浪之水清兮，可以濯吾缨；沧浪之水浊兮，可以濯吾足”。这句话的意思是：“沧浪的水清澈啊，可以洗我的帽带；沧浪的水浑浊啊，可以洗我的脚”。它表达了人们要根据自己的情况，灵活运用环境，从而达到最优的结果。

This is because after billions of years of evolution, the stars in the Milky Way have formed a stable structure, and this structure is regulated by the gravity of star clusters over time. When a star leaves or enters this stable structure, it will be affected by the gravity of other stars, thus changing its orbit. Therefore, the spacing between stars is usually within 3 to 6 light years, and this distribution is uniform.
